targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_tips AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (pool_id) *
    FROM node_tips 
    ORDER BY pool_id, updated_at DESC
)
SELECT CASE
    WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE hash IS NULL) > 0 THEN 'Degraded'
    WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT hash) = 1 AND SUM(CASE WHEN hash IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 
        THEN 'Healthy'
    ELSE 'Diverged' 
END AS status
FROM latest_tips;

SELECT 
    pool_id,
    block, 
    SUBSTRING(hash FROM 1 FOR 8) AS hash
FROM node_tips;

SELECT 
  id,
  title,
  subtitle,
  mainstat,
  secondarystat,
  color,
  icon from ci_nodes

SELECT 
  id,
  source,
  target from ci_edges ;

SELECT 
  id,
  title,
  subtitle,
  mainstat,
  secondarystat,
  color,
  icon from ci_nodes where id like 'p_bp' or id like 'p_' or id like 'p_r_' or id like 'p__'

SELECT 
  id,
  source,
  target from cn_edges ;

SELECT
 DATE_BIN('5 min',itime, '2000-1-1') AS time,
 AVG(rel_size) AS avg_rel_size,
 AVG(rel_mem) AS avg_rel_mem,
 AVG(rel_steps) AS avg_rel_steps
 FROM (
 SELECT
 MIN(b.time) AS itime,
 1.0 * MIN(b.size) / MIN(p.max_block_size) AS rel_size,
 SUM(r.unit_mem) / MIN(p.max_block_ex_mem) AS rel_mem,
 SUM(r.unit_steps) / MIN(p.max_block_ex_steps) AS rel_steps
 FROM block b
 LEFT JOIN tx t
 ON b.id = t.block_id
 LEFT JOIN redeemer r
 ON t.id = r.tx_id
 LEFT JOIN epoch_param p
 ON b.epoch_no = p.epoch_no
 WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
 GROUP BY b.hash
 ) a                                        
 GROUP BY time
 ORDER BY time;

panels.description: Fraction of canary TXs accepted within 2 blocks.
panels.title: TX 2 Blocks Acceptance Rate

panels.description: Percentage of blocks on tip served to downstream peers
panels.title: Served Ratio

targets.rawSql: select epoch_no,fees,treasury,reserves from ada_pots where source='yaci' order by epoch_no desc limit 5;
select epoch_no,fees,treasury,reserves from ada_pots where source='dbsync' order by epoch_no desc limit 5;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM ada_pots
            GROUP BY epoch_no
            HAVING NOT (
                (COUNT(DISTINCT fees) = 0 OR (COUNT(DISTINCT fees) = 1 AND COUNT(fees) = COUNT(*)))
                AND
                (COUNT(DISTINCT treasury) = 0 OR (COUNT(DISTINCT treasury) = 1 AND COUNT(treasury) = COUNT(*)))
                AND
                (COUNT(DISTINCT reserves) = 0 OR (COUNT(DISTINCT reserves) = 1 AND COUNT(reserves) = COUNT(*)))
            )
        ) THEN 'Consensus'
        ELSE 'Divergence'
    END AS result;
